Description: Two joining fragments of neck and sub-round handle of an Apulian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine beige-buff. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Exsonius. P. Palazzo, Le anfore di Apani (Brindisi), Rome 2013, 56, type A3.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (340)
